abstract.description: This is a CMSSW module for producing flat tuples containing jet properties from 13 TeV Run2 MC samples. The code is intended to run inside the CMS Open Data environment.

relations.description: The ouput dataset of this software tool is available in

system_details.description: Use this code with the CMS Open Data VM environment

title: JetNtupleProducerTool - a Jet tuple producer from CMS Run2 MiniAOD

usage.description:
If you do not have the CERN Virtual Machine for CMS open data installed, follow the instructions in step 1 at How to install a CERN Virtual Machine.

To run the analysis, follow the instructions in JetNtupleProducerTool documentation on GitHub.

use_with.description: Use this with Run2 QCD MiniAODSIM dataset (or any Run2 MiniAOD containing jets).
